overview:
Adam is a veteran search engine optimization (SEO) strategist, and a lead SEO with Zappos. He is a 2nd generation search marketer.

Adam is a second generation internet marketer and a lead SEO strategist at Zappos.com, who he’s worked with since 2001. Adam is also president and founder of AudetteMedia, a search marketing boutique located in Bend, Oregon providing SEO for clients such as Michelin, Phoenix.edu, Charming Shoppes, DriverSide and Motosport. Adam is also a senior SEO strategist to the international agency, AKQA.
